com.foreach.across.modules.filemanager.services

Class FileManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.filemanager.services.FileManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileManager, FileRepository, FileRepositoryRegistry

    @Service
public class FileManagerImpl
extends Object
implements FileManager, FileRepositoryRegistry
    Implementation of both FileManager and FileRepositoryRegistry. The registry deals out delegate implementations ensuring that the actual implementation can be replaced at runtime.
    See Also:
    FileRepositoryDelegate

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.foreach.across.modules.filemanager.services.FileManager

    • Method Detail

      • createTempFile

        public File createTempFile()
        Description copied from interface: FileManager
        Quick creates a physical file in the temporary FileRepository. The file returned can safely be used for writing to and can afterwards be moved to a particular FileRepository using FileRepository.moveInto(java.io.File).
        Specified by:
        createTempFile in interface FileManager
        Returns:
        A File instance to be used.

      • getRepositoryId

        public String getRepositoryId()
        Specified by:
        getRepositoryId in interface FileRepository
        Returns:
        The unique id of the file repository.

      • createFile

        public FileDescriptor createFile()
        Description copied from interface: FileRepository
        Create a new file in the repository. This allocates the file instance, but the content of the file is empty. What exactly empty means depends on the implementation of the repository.
        Specified by:
        createFile in interface FileRepository
        Returns:
        FileDescriptor instance.

      • moveInto

        public FileDescriptor moveInto(File file)
        Description copied from interface: FileRepository
        Moves a File into the repository, once the file is fully available in the repository an attempt will be made to delete the original file.

        No exception will be thrown if the delete fails as the new instance will be available in the repository already and this is considered the important part of the transaction.

        Specified by:
        moveInto in interface FileRepository
        Parameters:
        file - File instance to move into the repository.
        Returns:
        FileDescriptor instance.

      • save

        public FileDescriptor save(File file)
        Description copied from interface: FileRepository
        Stores a file in the repository, but leaves the original file alone. If you want to move a temporary file to the repository and delete it immediately when done, use FileRepository.moveInto(java.io.File) instead.
        Specified by:
        save in interface FileRepository
        Parameters:
        file - File instance to save in the repository.
        Returns:
        FileDescriptor instance.

      • save

        public FileDescriptor save(InputStream inputStream)
        Description copied from interface: FileRepository
        Stores an InputStream as a new file in the repository.
        Specified by:
        save in interface FileRepository
        Parameters:
        inputStream - InputStream of the file content.
        Returns:
        FileDescriptor instance.

      • createFile

        public FileDescriptor createFile(String repositoryId)
        Description copied from interface: FileManager
        Create a new file in the repository. This allocates the file instance, but the content of the file is empty. What exactly empty means depends on the implementation of the repository.
        Specified by:
        createFile in interface FileManager
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • moveInto

        public FileDescriptor moveInto(String repositoryId,
                               File file)
        Description copied from interface: FileManager
        Moves a File into the repository, once the file is fully available in the repository an attempt will be made to delete the original file.

        No exception will be thrown if the delete fails as the new instance will be available in the repository already and this is considered the important part of the transaction.

        Specified by:
        moveInto in interface FileManager
        Parameters:
        repositoryId - Id of the file repository.
        file - File instance to move into the repository.
        Returns:
        FileDescriptor instance.

      • save

                           File file)
        Description copied from interface: FileManager
        Stores a file in the repository, but leaves the original file alone. If you want to move a temporary file to the repository and delete it immediately when done, use FileRepository.moveInto(java.io.File) instead.
        Specified by:
        save in interface FileManager
        Parameters:
        repositoryId - Id of the file repository.
        file - File instance to save in the repository.

        FileDescriptor instance.

      • delete

        public boolean delete(FileDescriptor descriptor)
        Description copied from interface: FileRepository
        Deletes a file from the repository.
        Specified by:
        delete in interface FileRepository
        Parameters:
        descriptor - FileDescriptor instance.
        Returns:

      • getOutputStream

        public OutputStream getOutputStream(FileDescriptor descriptor)
        Description copied from interface: FileRepository
        Get an OutputStream that can be used to update the contents of the file. No matter the repository implementation, writes to the OutputStream should replace the existing contents. Depending on the implementation, this can happen on close(), flush() or instantaneously.
        Specified by:
        getOutputStream in interface FileRepository
        Parameters:
        descriptor - FileDescriptor instance.
        Returns:
        OutputStream that can be used to update the contents of the file.

      • getInputStream

        public InputStream getInputStream(FileDescriptor descriptor)
        Description copied from interface: FileRepository
        Get an InputStream to read the contents of the file. Reading the stream *should not be done more than once* to ensure compatibility across FileRepository implementations. Once a stream has been consumed, a new InputStream should be requested of the repository. If the file does not exist null will be returned.
        Specified by:
        getInputStream in interface FileRepository
        Parameters:
        descriptor - FileDescriptor instance.
        Returns:
        InputStream for the contents of the file.

      • getAsFile

        public File getAsFile(FileDescriptor descriptor)
        Description copied from interface: FileRepository
        Gets the file contents as a File instance. This file *should not be used for writing* as the file instance might be a local cached instance depending on the implementation. If you want to write directly you should use FileRepository.getOutputStream(com.foreach.across.modules.filemanager.business.FileDescriptor).
        Specified by:
        getAsFile in interface FileRepository
        Parameters:
        descriptor - FileDescriptor instance.
        Returns:
        File instance.

      • exists

        public boolean exists(FileDescriptor descriptor)
        Description copied from interface: FileRepository
        Checks if a descriptor actually points to an existing file.
        Specified by:
        exists in interface FileRepository
        Parameters:
        descriptor - FileDescriptor instance.
        Returns:
        True if the file exists.

      • move

        public boolean move(FileDescriptor source,
                    FileDescriptor target)
        Description copied from interface: FileRepository
        Moves the file "original" into "renamed", which may not exist yet.

        An IllegalArgumentException will be thrown if the two are not in the same repository.
        Specified by:
        move in interface FileRepository
        Parameters:
        source - FileDescriptor instance of the original file.
        target - FileDescriptor instance of the wanted resulting file.
        Returns:
        True if the file was successfully moved.

      • setFileRepositoryFactory

        public void setFileRepositoryFactory(FileRepositoryFactory factory)
        Description copied from interface: FileRepositoryRegistry
        Set the FileRepositoryFactory that should be used if a repository is looked up for the first time, but no repository is registered yet under that id.
        Specified by:
        setFileRepositoryFactory in interface FileRepositoryRegistry
        Parameters:
        factory - FileRepositoryFactory instance or null.

        Returns:

      • repositoryExists

        public boolean repositoryExists(String repositoryId)
        Description copied from interface: FileRepositoryRegistry
        Checks if a FileRepository with the given id exists. Will not attempt to create it if it does not.
        Specified by:
        repositoryExists in interface FileRepositoryRegistry
        Parameters:
        repositoryId - Id of the file repository.
        Returns:
        True if a FileRepository is registered with that id.

      • registerRepository

        public FileRepository registerRepository(FileRepository fileRepository)
        Description copied from interface: FileRepositoryRegistry
        Adds a FileRepository to the registry. This will replace the currently registered repository with that name. This method can return a different instance of the FileRepository that is supposed to be used instead of the original passed in. The default FileManagerImpl wraps provided FileRepository instances in a FileRepositoryDelegate so they can be replaced at runtime.
        Specified by:
        registerRepository in interface FileRepositoryRegistry
        Parameters:
        fileRepository - FileRepository instance.
        See Also:
        FileRepositoryDelegate
